OrgName: Confirmit, Inc. and its wholly owned subsidiary CustomerSat.com, Inc.
activities: Confirmit is an Application Service Provider for companies conducting data collection activities via the Internet, primarily Market Research activities. Confirmit receives personal information from the EU/EEA and Switzerland as a result of its operations and provisions of online customer support.  Our proprietary software enables our client’s to create and deploy surveys to their customers and/or employees.  While the data collected is stored by our third party hosting provider, Rackspace (www.Rackspace.com), Confirmit, in its provision of online customer support may have access to such data.  Through our company website, we collect contact information, which is voluntarily entered by our customers, prospects and visitors.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
